channel.title: Calibration on Fuwei's Tech Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Calibration on Fuwei's Tech Notes

item.title: LiDAR Extrinsic Parameter Adjustment for SLAM Recalibration
item.description: Mathematical framework for recalibrating SLAM poses and maps when LiDAR extrinsic parameters change, without rerunning the entire SLAM process while preserving annotations.

item.title: Perspective-n-Point (PnP) Problem
item.description: An introduction to the Perspective-n-Point (PnP) problem.

item.title: Fisheye Camera Extrinsic EOL Calibration
item.description: Introduction to the fisheye camera extrinsic EOL calibration.
